flawed_nl_solution:
40% of the class is boys because 100-60=<<100-60=40>>40
There are 10.0 boys because 25x.4=<<25*.4=10.0>>10.0
60% of the boys don't like playing basketball because 100-40=<<100-40=40>>40
6 boys don't like playing basketball because 10.0x.6=4.0
12 girls like playing basketball because 4.0x2=<<4.0*2=8.0>>8.0
There are 15.0 girls in the class because 25-10.0=<<25-10.0=15.0>>15.0
80% of the girls in class like playing basketball because 8.0/15.0=<<8.0/15.0=0.5333333333333333>>0.5333333333333333

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
